long_description: This paddle leash ensures you won't lose your paddle, even in rough conditions. Quick-release allows paddle to be swiftly and easily attached to or detached from leash. Streamlined, low-profile retractile cord is easy to pack and stays out the way, while providing an 8-foot expansion. Constructed with a heavy-duty snaphook for maximum durability and an internal Kevlar(R) cord filament for maximum breaking strength. Measures 34.25 inches and stretches to 8 feet.
short_description: This paddle leash ensures you won't lose your paddle, even in rough conditions.
